title: The Halloween Mismatch: Hayrides and Honeymoons
description: A new autumn season has come to Harvest Ranch, Virginia, and it’s time for another Harvest Festival!Kindergarten teacher Daisy and haunted house designer Theo have very different ideas when it comes to creating a “spooky walk” fundraiser for the Harvest Festival. As they try to convince each other that their way is best, will they listen to what their hearts are trying to tell them?A funny, opposites attract sweet romance that’s not even a little bit scary ❤️
author: Amberlee Day
